title: DISTANCE MEASURING DEVICE
abstract: The invention relates to a distance measuring device, in particular a hand-held laser distance meter, comprising a housing (12) and a transmission unit arranged in the housing (12) for transmitting a measuring radiation (18) in the direction of an object to be measured, a receiving unit for receiving measuring radiation (18) returning from the object to be measured, and a first operating element (20) for triggering at least one distance measurement. According to the invention, the first operating element (20) is designed in the form of a disk element. The invention further relates to a method for operating a distance measuring device, in particular for operating a hand-held laser distance meter, wherein at least one first distance measurement is started by means of a first operating element (20) provided on the housing (12) of the distance measuring device (10). The first operating element (20) is moved from a second position (B) in which the distance measuring device is deactivated into a first position (A), in particular along the measurement axis, in order to trigger a first distance measurement, in particular in order to trigger a sequence of distance measurements, in particular a sequence of continuous distance measurements.

motivations: There is a need for an improved user interface in distance measuring devices, particularly hand-held laser distance meters, to enhance usability and efficiency.
objectives: Design a novel operating element for a distance measuring device that simplifies the measurement process.
Develop a method for operating a distance measuring device that utilizes the new operating element for efficient distance measurements.
methods: Implement a disk element as the first operating element to trigger distance measurements.
Utilize a movement mechanism for the operating element to transition between deactivated and measurement-triggering positions.
results: Enhance the usability and efficiency of distance measuring devices through an intuitive operating element.
Enable users to easily trigger single or continuous distance measurements with the new operating mechanism.

motivations: Existing distance measuring devices may not be user-friendly or efficient in triggering distance measurements.
objectives: Design a distance measuring device, particularly a hand-held laser distance meter, with a disk element as the first operating element for triggering distance measurements.

Develop a method for operating the distance measuring device where triggering a sequence of distance measurements is achieved by moving the first operating element from a deactivated position to an activated position.
methods: Incorporate a disk element as the first operating element in the housing of the distance measuring device.
Trigger distance measurements by moving the first operating element from a deactivated position to an activated position, potentially along the measurement axis.
results: Provide a more user-friendly and efficient way to trigger distance measurements using a hand-held laser distance meter.
openai_json.research_subject: Design and operation of a distance measuring device with a disk element as the operating element

motivations: There is a need for improved ergonomic design and user interface in hand-held distance measuring devices to enhance usability and measurement accuracy.
objectives: Develop a distance measuring device with an innovative disk-shaped operating element that improves user control and measurement triggering.
Create a method for operating the device that allows intuitive activation and control of distance measurements through positional movement of the operating element.
methods: Design a housing containing transmission and receiving units for laser-based distance measurement with a disk-shaped operating element.
Implement a positional control system where the operating element moves between deactivated and activated positions to trigger measurements.
results: Enhanced user experience and control in hand-held laser distance meters through innovative disk-shaped operating element design.
Improved measurement triggering mechanism that allows for single measurements or continuous measurement sequences.
